profile_summary:
As a dedicated Software Developer with 8 years of rich experience, I focus on leveraging essential skills such as **Python**, **Microservices**, **API Design**, **Relational Databases**, and **Automation** to build efficient and scalable applications. I possess in-depth knowledge of **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Consul**, and **Jenkins**, which enable me to implement CI/CD processes and streamline development workflows effectively. My experience includes utilizing **Prometheus** for monitoring and optimization, along with working with **RabbitMQ** to ensure robust message queuing.

Proficient in crafting high-performance solutions across diverse sectors such as healthcare and finance, I excel in full-stack development with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My comprehensive cloud expertise extends across **Azure** and **AWS**, assisting in the deployment of reliable, enterprise-grade platforms. Additionally, I specialize in developing and deploying machine learning models and MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, integrating AI/ML capabilities for enhanced predictive analytics and intelligent automation.
